```{r moive_list, echo=F, message=F, warning=F, results = 'asis'}
output_col_names <- c(
    'IMDB ID',
    'DOUBAN ID',
    '名称',
    '导演',
    '主演',
    'IMDB 评分',
    '豆瓣评分',
    '打个分'
)

movie_list <- read_tsv(
    '../data/cn/movie-list.tsv',
    col_types = 'ccccccDDddd')

movie_table <- function(movies) {
    which_year <- movies[1, ]$release_year
    which_year <- which_year_(which_year)
    header_ <- paste0('<h2>', which_year, '</h2>')
    table_ <- movies %>%
        arrange(desc(release_date), director, name) %>%
        select(c('imdb_id_html', 'douban_id_html', 'linked_name', 'director',
                 'actors', 'imdb_rating_html', 'douban_rating_html', 'stars')) %>%
        setNames(output_col_names) %>%
        kable("html", escape = F, table.attr = 'class="movie-table"') %>%
        kable_styling(bootstrap_options = 'striped') %>%
        row_spec(0, align = 'right') %>%
        column_spec(1:2, extra_css = 'display: none;', include_thead = T) %>%
        column_spec(6, width = '3em') %>%
        column_spec(7, width = '3em') %>%
        column_spec(8, width = '7em')
    footer_ <- '<br/>'
    
    tibble(table_ = paste0(header_, table_, footer_))
}

movie_list_ <- movie_list %>%
    mutate(
        imdb_id_html = imdb_id_html_(imdb_id),
        douban_id_html = douban_id_html_(douban_id),
        linked_name = linked_text_(name, blog_link),
        imdb_rating = imdb_rating_(imdb_id)$rating,
        imdb_rating_html = imdb_rating_(imdb_id)$html,
        douban_rating = douban_rating_(douban_id)$rating,
        douban_rating_html = douban_rating_(douban_id)$html)

movie_list_ %>%
    select(c('imdb_id', 'douban_id', 'blog_link', 'name',
             'director', 'actors', 'release_date', 'watch_date',
             'imdb_rating', 'douban_rating', 'rating')) %>%
    write_tsv('../data/cn/movie-list.tsv')

movie_list_ %>%
    mutate(
        stars = stars_(rating),
        release_year = year(release_date)) %>%
    ddply(.(release_year), movie_table) %>%
    arrange(desc(release_year)) %>%
    select(table_) %>%
    unlist %>%
    cat
```
